w:r.w:t: Create a new book using a template OR
Change images (click on change image icon)
Format text (click on the gear icon)
Copy/delete/move pages (page drag icons, or click icons below page panel)
Change paper size as needed (dropdown list Options)
Choose type of collection (vernacular or shellbook)
Fill in details of language and country
Choose from list or choose more ??
Scroll down and click on template
Click on Create book based in this source
Configure stages – letters, wordlist, graphemes for each stage
Create a book from a source
